casebody.data:
STATE OF CONNECTICUT v. RONALD COTTON (AC 15734)

Foti, Landau and Heiman, Js.

Argued June 4 officially released July 8, 1997 Per Curiam.

This appeal is controlled by State v. Jarzbek, 204 Conn. 683, 529 A.2d 1245 (1987), cert. denied, 484 U.S. 1061, 108 S. Ct. 1017, 98 L. Ed. 2d 982 (1988).

The judgment is affirmed.
